title: Live streaming, live updates of IPL 2017 auction: Where to follow live updates | cricket | Hindustan Times
text:
Desimartini Live streaming, live updates of IPL 2017 auction: Where to follow live updates 
Live streaming and live updates of the IPL 2017 Auction is available online. The England duo of Ben Stokes and Tymal Mills were the stars of the IPL 2017 as they went for Rs 14.5 crore and Rs 12 crore respectively. Details of all the updates on Monday can be found here. cricket Updated: Feb 20, 2017 15:20 IST HT Correspondent New Delhi The IPL 2017 auction will take place in Bengaluru on Monday. Follow live updates of the auction here.(IPL) 
The England duo of Ben Stokes and Tymal Mills were the stars of the IPL 2017 as they went for Rs 14.5 crore and Rs 12 crore respectively. Kagiso Rabada was taken by Delhi Daredevils for Rs 5 crore. Karn Sharma became the highest Indian player to be bid in the auction till now as he was picked up by Mumbai Indians for Rs 3.2 crores, followed by TNatarajan who went for Rs 3 crore to KXIP. 
Live streaming of the 2017 IPL Auction will be available from 09:00 AM onwards. You can also follow live updates of the auction here. ( LIVEBLOG ) 
The 2017 IPL Auction will witness 356 players go under the hammer. With a maximum of 27 players allowed in every squad with nine overseas players, the eight franchises will be weighing their options . Kings XI Punjab have the highest auction purse with Rs 23.1 crores. Mumbai Indians have the least purse with Rs 11.5 crores. 
Where to watch live 
The 2017 IPL Auction will be scheduled for a 9.00am IST start. Live Streaming and live TV information is below. 
Live TV: The IPL Player Auction will be broadcast live on Sony Six and Sony Six HD 
Live Streaming: Hotstar.com 
One can also follow live updates on hindustantimes.com/sports tags
